name: Pocket Pins
description:
The most fun and entertaining bowling game to date!

* A simple but challenging gameplay.
* Score as many strikes possible without striking out.
* Unlocks:
- 6 Unique Bowling Balls.
- 7 Amazing Bowling Pins.
- 10 Stunning Bowling Lanes with country flags themes.

Remember that we're always reading your feedback and are working hard on creating new content and of course fixing any issues you may find.

We'd really appreciate if you'd report what you like or dislike and any issues you may have with the game to kobgamesstudio@gmail.com and please include your device make and model.

KobGames Studios
kobgamesstudio@gmail.com
